dataIdInfo.idPurp: These tools are designed to take an Excel workbook, containing multiple sheets worth of data with Longitude, Latitude, and Depth points and convert them into separate point feature classes. The NetCDF to Excel will be used on multidimensional NetCDF files to transform into an Excel workbook containing data from the second dimension selected. Once done with that, will be able to use the Excel to Points tool on the newly created Excel workbook to turn them all into point feature classes.
